channel.title: Deathlypvps World name
channel.description: hi i want to change my dealthypvps v3 worlds name world 1 is normal world world 2 is Hack3r's world I want to change this ones name but i can't find it :S

item.title: Deathlypvps World name
item.dc:creator: @Munien Munien
item.description:
@Munien wrote:

open client.java -

Search for

you should see something like this

public void handleStupidWorldSwitch() { if(world > 1){ //STOPS MORE THAN 2 WORLD RE-WRITE LATER world = 1; }else{ world += 1; } if(world == 1){ serverip = ""+defaultServerIP+""; port = 43595; spec ="@red@Normal World"; signlink.setuid(); } else { if(world == 2){ serverip = ""+defaultServerIPw2+""; port = 43595; signlink.setuid(); spec =" @red@Hack3r`s World"; } } if(world < 0 || world > 7) spec = " Invalid world"; }

Replace “Hack3r’s World” With what you want

example

public void handleStupidWorldSwitch() { if(world > 1){ //STOPS MORE THAN 2 WORLD RE-WRITE LATER world = 1; }else{ world += 1; } if(world == 1){ serverip = ""+defaultServerIP+""; port = 43595; spec ="@red@Normal World"; signlink.setuid(); } else { if(world == 2){ serverip = ""+defaultServerIPw2+""; port = 43595; signlink.setuid(); spec =" @red@*World name here*"; } } if(world < 0 || world > 7) spec = " Invalid world"; }
Then just compile your client and your good to go

Read full topic
